A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class cell.Pathogen
This method is used to detect when to decrement the time left in the cool down (the Timer object calls this method every 1 second).
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class game.Game
This method is used to move the pathogen according to what keys the user pressed, but adding xVel and yVel to xLoc and yLoc respectivly.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class game.Pause
This method is used to determine what should be done depending on what button was pressed.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class window.GameFrame
This actionPerformed method is overriden to detect actions within the JFrame.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class window.GamePanel
This overriden method is used to detect any actions that the user performs on the JPanel.
addAntibody() - Method in class levels.Level
This method is used to add antibodies to the list of cells.
addTarget() - Method in class levels.Level
This method is used to add the targetted cell, as well as the boss.
ais - Variable in class window.GamePanel
This object reference variable to AudioInputStreams is used to reference the music that is to be played.
ammo - Variable in class cell.Bacteria
This integer is used to store the the amount times that the bacteria can send out minion bacteria before the cooldown of this ability.
ammoBar - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of an ammunition bar (for level 2).

B

background - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to load the background of the game.
Bacteria - Class in cell
This class is used to create the Bacteria pathogen which has the ability to multiply.
Bacteria() - Constructor for class cell.Bacteria
This is the class constructor which is used to assign values to the instance variables and initialize the variables in the super class (the immunity).
bodyGuards - Variable in class cell.Parasite
This ArrayList of Entities is used to store the bodyguards of the parasite.
Boss - Class in cell
This data class is used to store the attributes of the boss of the game.
Boss() - Constructor for class cell.Boss
This is the class constructor is used to create this Object and call the super class' construtor to define the data fields that need to be defined in the super class with them.
boss - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of the boss.
boss - Variable in class levels.Level
This object reference variable is used to store the boss that the user is to face.
bossAnimationCounter - Variable in class game.Game
This integer is used to determine whether or not the boss has been animated in a certain way yet, to determine what should be displayed next.
bossHasAnimated - Variable in class levels.Level
This boolean is used to determine whether the boss has entered the screen or not yet.

C

canDuplicate() - Method in class cell.Parasite
This method is used to determine whether the parasite can duplicate or not (returns either true or false, depending on whether or not it can duplicate).
canFire() - Method in class cell.Bacteria
This accessor method is used to check if the bacteria can send out its miny bacteria by checking the amount of times that it can multiply into them (ammo) (if it has more than 0 tries left, true will be returned).
canIncreaseImmunity() - Method in class cell.Virus
This helper method is used to determine whether or not the virus can increase its immunity by returning either true or false.
canInfectTarget() - Method in class levels.Level
This return method is used to get whether or not the user is at the final stage of a level.
canInsert(HighScore) - Method in class highscores.HighScoreLoader
This method is used to check if another highscore can be added to the list of highscores.
cell - package cell
 
Cell - Class in cell
This class is used to create the cells that appear in the game.
Cell(double, int, int) - Constructor for class cell.Cell
This constructor is used to create an instance of a cell, with a specified health, colour and name.
cells - Variable in class levels.Level
This object reference variable to ArrayList (Generic type Cell) is used to store all the cells that appear in the game besides the pathogen.
circles - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to an integer array list is used to store the location of the tracker circles on the progress bar.
clip - Variable in class window.GamePanel
This object reference variable to Clip is used to play the music.
CollisionDetection - Class in game
This class is used to detect any collisions that occur in the game.
CollisionDetection() - Constructor for class game.CollisionDetection
 
controls - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference varialbe to BufferedImage is used to create the image displaying where everything is on the screen and what it means to the user.
counter - Variable in class game.Game
This integer is used to determine when the progress bar should be incrased.
counter - Variable in class levels.Level
This integer is used to store a number that increments by 1 every time cells fall down, to determine when the next antibody should spawn.

D

d - Variable in class window.GameFrame
This variable is an object reference variable to JDialog and it used to create the help & about dialogs.
damageTarget() - Method in class levels.Level
This method is used to complete a portion of code that is repeated more than once.
dialog(String, String) - Method in class window.GameFrame
This method is used to create the JDialog box that appears as the help or about dialog.
difficulty - Variable in class game.GameInfo
This integer is used to store the difficulty that the user selects.
difficulty - Variable in class highscores.HighScore
This private String object reference will store the difficulty that the score was achieved with.
difficultyFactor - Variable in class game.Game
This double is used to store the difficulty rate of the level, which in turn will increase the spawn of white blood cells.
difficultyName - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to String is used to store the name of the difficulty that the user is playing on.
difficultySelection() - Method in class window.GamePanel
This method is used to select the difficulty and level that the user will play on, as well as input their name.
display() - Method in class splashscreen.SplashScreen
This method is used to display the splashscreen.
displayPane(int) - Method in class game.Game
This helper method is used to display the teaching messages of the game.
doneGame() - Method in class window.GameFrame
This method is used to close the Game JPanel that the user was playing on, and return to the main menu.
donePause(boolean) - Method in class window.GameFrame
This method is used to finish the paused state of the game.
drawText(Graphics, int, int, String, int, Dimension) - Method in class highscores.HighScoresPrinter
This private method is a helper method that will be used to draw some of the text that will be printed and centered.

E

end(boolean) - Method in class game.Game
This helper method is used to check what options should be displayed, and whether the user should be congradulated or not.
Entity - Class in cell
This is a data class for any entity in the game.
Entity(int, int) - Constructor for class cell.Entity
This is the class constructor which assigns values to the data fields in Entity (the x and y positions of the Entity).

F

filterCells() - Method in class levels.Level
This method is used to get rid of any cells in the arraylist of cells that have moved past the visible screen.
frame - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to GameFrame is used to control the panels within the frame.
frame - Variable in class game.Pause
This object reference to GameFrame is used store the GameFrame that will contain this panel.
frame - Variable in class window.GamePanel
This object reference variable to GameFrame is used to store the frame that is used to contain the GamePanel.

G

g - Variable in class window.GameFrame
This object reference variable to GamePanel is used to store the GamePanel object that will be used for as the JPanel of all main menu elements.
g2 - Variable in class window.GameFrame
This object reference variable to Game is used to store the Game object that is being used during the game.
game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
This class will create the panel used for the actual game play.
Game(GameFrame) - Constructor for class game.Game
This constructor is used to create the game, store the frame that it will be contained in, set the level, difficulty and the username.
game() - Method in class window.GameFrame
This method is used to create a new Game about which will be added to the JFrame and start the game.
GameApp - Class in window
This class will run the game itself by creating a new frame for the game.
GameApp() - Constructor for class window.GameApp
 
GameFrame - Class in window
This class will create the JFrame of the game.
GameFrame() - Constructor for class window.GameFrame
This is the class constructor which will create the actual Frame of the game window along with the menu bar, menus and menu items.
GameInfo - Class in game
This class is used to store the information about the user and the level, difficulty, and settings that they are playing with.
GameInfo(boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class game.GameInfo
This is the class constructor which is used to assign values to only 2 of the data fields (the two booleans).
GamePanel - Class in window
This class will create the JPanel of the game.
GamePanel(GameFrame) - Constructor for class window.GamePanel

This accessor method is used to get if the learning mode of the game is on or not.

This accessor method is used to get the time remaining in the cooldown of the pathogen.

This accessor method is used to return the tracker of the progress bar of the game as an integer.

This accessor method returns the x position of the entity.

This accessor method is used to get the y velocity of the pathogen.

This method is used to create the goodbye screen, where credits are shown and the user is thanked for playing the game.

H

hasCollided(Rectangle, Rectangle) - Static method in class game.CollisionDetection
This static method is used to return true or false depending on whether or not two rectangles (boundaries of objects) collide.
hasIncreased - Variable in class levels.Level1
This boolean is used to store true or false depending on if the virus' immunity has increased or not.
hasStarted - Variable in class game.Game
This boolean is used to determine whether or not the game play has started.
hasWon - Variable in class levels.Level
This integer is used to determine whether or not the game is in progress (hasWon = 0), the game has been won (1) or if it has been lost (hasWon = 2).
HEADER - Variable in class highscores.HighScoreLoader
This final String variable will store the header of the GameData.LT file.

This private double is used to store the health of the cell.

This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to reference the image of the health bar.

This class is used to store an individual highscore.

This is the class constructor (with four parameters).
highScore() - Method in class window.GamePanel
This method is used to display the top 10 highscores to the player.
HighScoreLoader - Class in highscores
This class is used to load all highscores, and add more highscores.
HighScoreLoader() - Constructor for class highscores.HighScoreLoader
This is the class constructor which will load all scores that were achieved before, or create a new file for the highscores if there is an error with the file.

I

imageLoader(String) - Static method in class window.GamePanel
This method is used to return the picture specified by the method that calls it.
immunity - Variable in class cell.Pathogen
This variable will store the immunity of the pathogen as a double - how resistant it is (the damage the pathogen takes will be multiplyed by this real number).

This double is used to store the chance of the virus being able to increase its immunity.

This method is used to create the instructions screen, where there is a special background is set, and there is a prompt to press a key.
interval - Variable in class cell.Pathogen
This integer will store the amount of time remaining in the ability cooldowns.

This integer is used to cue when the main menu should be called (after the splash screen has finished).
isTargettingCell - Variable in class levels.Level
This boolean is used to store whether the user has started to try to infect the targetted cell or not.

This method is used to create the settings screen, where a special backgound is set and there is a prompt to press a key.
setTracker(int) - Method in class levels.Level
This mutator method is used to alter the tracker of the progress bar by incrementing it by a certain value.
setWriting(JLabel) - Method in class window.GamePanel
This helper method sets the font to a specified label to Century Gothic, size 20 font.
setX(int) - Method in class cell.Entity
This mutator method sets the x position of the entity.
setXVel(int) - Method in class cell.Pathogen
This mutator method is used to set the x velocity of the pathogen to a new x velocity.
setY(int) - Method in class cell.Entity
This mutator method sets the y position of the entity.
setYVel(int) - Method in class cell.Pathogen
This mutator method is used to set the y velocity of the pathogen to a new y velocity.
shouldAdd - Variable in class levels.Level
This boolean variable is used to store true if antibodies should be spawning, and false if they should not.
shouldDraw - Variable in class window.GamePanel
This boolean is used to determine when a box should be drawn around the user's selections in the difficultySelection screen.
shouldDrawTarget() - Method in class levels.Level
This return method is used to check if the target should be drawn.
shouldTeach - Variable in class game.GameInfo
This boolean is used to store true if the program is on learning mode (the user is learning), and false if vice versa.
shouldTeachWbc - Variable in class game.GameInfo
This boolean is used to store true if information about white blood cells should be taught, and false if vice versa.
splashscreen - package splashscreen
 
SplashScreen - Class in splashscreen
This class extends the Thread class and is used to run the splash screen of the game.
SplashScreen(JPanel) - Constructor for class splashscreen.SplashScreen
This is the class constructor which will assign the proper JPanel value to the instance variable which is an object reference variable to JPanel.
splashScreen() - Method in class window.GamePanel
This method is used to display a splash screen.
startGame(boolean) - Method in class window.GameFrame
This method is used to start the actual game by removing the panel with the main menu and a new panel.
startTimer() - Method in class game.Game
This method is used to start the updating of the game screen.

T

targetPic - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of the targetted cell.
TargettedCell - Class in cell
This class is used to create the cell that will be targetted by the pathogen.
TargettedCell() - Constructor for class cell.TargettedCell
This is the constructor which will call the super classes' constructor to assign the appropriate values to its parameters.
time - Variable in class game.Game
This integer is used to store the time that has passed (and will be used to display the teaching
timer() - Method in class cell.Pathogen
This method is used to start the cooldowns for the pathogen.
timer(int) - Method in class cell.Pathogen
This method is used to start the cooldowns for the pathogen.
timer - Variable in class window.GamePanel
This object reference variable to Timer is used to set up a timer so that the mainmenu call is delayed, therefore allowing the user to see the splash screen.
timer() - Method in class window.GamePanel
This helper method is used to delay when main menu is called, so that splash screen can be fully displayed.
title() - Method in class window.GamePanel
This helper method is to be called in other classes, to create a title in a set font in white, centered on the screen.
tm - Variable in class cell.Pathogen
This object reference variable to Timer is used to store a Timer which will be used to count down 5 seconds for ability cool downs in the game.
tm - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to Timer is used to create a new Timer that will be used to call the actionPerformed method every 3 milliseconds (so that the movement animation is smoother).
tracker - Variable in class levels.Level
This integer is used to store the position of the progress bar in the game.

U

update() - Method in class levels.Level
This method is used to lower the user's health when they have hit an antibody, as well as update locations of entities.
update() - Method in class levels.Level1
This overriden method is used to update the level just as the super class does and add the ability of the virus as well (its ability to increase immunity).
update() - Method in class levels.Level2
This method is used to do all the updates the main update (in level) does, as well as reset the ammunition, when necessary, and update it.
update() - Method in class levels.Level3
This method is used to update the level along with the pathogen's guards.

V

Virus - Class in cell
This class is used to create the virus pathogen which has the ability to change its immunity level.
Virus() - Constructor for class cell.Virus
This is the class constructor which assigns calls the constructor of the super class to set an immunity for the virus.

W

WhiteBloodCell - Class in cell
This class is used to create the white blood cell.
WhiteBloodCell() - Constructor for class cell.WhiteBloodCell
This is the class constructor which will set the x and y positions of the white blood cell.
whiteBloodCell - Variable in class game.Game
This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to reference the image of a white blood cell.
window - package window
 

X

x - Variable in class cell.Entity
This integer stores the x position of the entity.
x - Variable in class levels.Level2
This integer is a for loop variable which stores the iteration of the for loop that the for loop is on while it is running.
xVel - Variable in class cell.Pathogen
This integer stores the x velocity of the pathogen's movement.

y - Variable in class cell.Entity
This integer stores the y position of the entity.

This integer stores the y velocity of the pathogen's movement.
